snippet: In a mocking and unexpectedly theatrical appearance, Mr. Carson delivered a public scolding of the news media that has begun to question his celebrated biography.
abstract: Ben Carson, Republican presidential candidate known for soft-spoken style, attacks news media during news conference, turning political ritual that often puts candidates on defensive into confrontation; Carson accuses reporters of political bias.
lead_paragraph: In a mocking and unexpectedly theatrical appearance, Mr. Carson delivered a public scolding of the news media that has begun to question his celebrated biography.

headline.main: Ben Carson Turns Heat on Reporters in Feisty News Conference
headline.print_headline: Feisty Carson Turns Heat on Reporters, Making Political Ritual Into Confrontation
